article.title: 10 Best Things To Do In Kuta, Bali, At Night
article.lead_paragraph: Kuta is not just the place where Australian youngsters go to party all night! Kuta is a lively town with a busy tourist center, a stunning stretch of sunset beach and traditional night markets just outside of the center. There is a lot of things to see and experience after the sun has set. Here are 10 things to do in Kuta at night:
article.meta_description: Kuta has a lot more to offer than most people think. After sunset, the town is alive and kicking and yes, there is a whole lot more to do than clubbing. Here are 10 things to do in Kuta at night:

snippets.title: 1. Sunset Cocktails
snippets.description:
Of course, the best way to start a perfect evening in Kuta is by watching the magnificent and enchanting sunset that Kuta is so famous for. Go find the perfect seat at one of the oceanfront bars, order your favorite cocktail and let the evening start with a spectacular show of nature. The sky will transform from blue into warm orange, red and purple before finally, the night sky appears. It is magical and it can be quite romantic if you are spending the evening with the right person!

> #### The Boardwalk at Bali Garden
>
> **Address**: Jalan Kartika, Tuban, Kuta, Bali, Indonesia
>
> **Price**: From 2 USD
>
> **Opening Hours**:  11am - 11pm.
>
> **Duration**: Around 2 hours required.
>
> **Access**: Located next to the Discovery Shopping Mall.
>
> **Contact**:  +62 361 752725
>
> **Near by Food**:  Bali Garden
>
> **Website**: [The Boardwalk](http://boardwalk-restaurant.com/)

snippets.title: 2. Romantic dinner by the sea at Bali Garden
snippets.title_with_numbering: 2. Romantic dinner by the sea at Bali Garden
snippets.description:
After sunset, it is time for an intimate candlelight dinner. Why not enjoy it by the seaside where you sipped your sunset cocktails? The Bali Garden is an absolute ocean-front beach resort with excellent service, nice decor, and live music, adding to the romantic atmosphere. The Boardwalk Restaurant serves delicious food for you and your loved one(s) to enjoy.

> #### Bali Garden Beach Resort
>
> **Address**:  Jl. Kartika, Tuban, Kuta, Bali, Indonesia
>
> **Price**: Main dishes range from 39.000 - 115.000 IDR (2.90 - 8.65 USD)
>
> **Opening Hours**:  11am - 11pm. Closed on public holidays.
>
> **Duration**:  Around 2 hours required.
>
> **Access**: Located next to the Discovery Shopping Mall
>
> **Contact**:  +62 361 752725
>
> **Website**: [Bali Garden Beach Resort](https://www.baligardenbeachresort.com/)

snippets.title: 3. Rooftop BBQ at Sky Garden
snippets.description:
Another option is to go for an amazing Rooftop BBQ at the most happening night club in Kuta: Sky Garden. The BBQ starts at 5pm and continues till 9pm which means you have four hours to munch all kinds of delicious food at this all-you-can-eat BBQ feast. On top of that, there is a free-flow bar where you can get all kinds of mixed drinks and draft beers. Party time! When the BBQ is over you can stick around for the buzzing Sky Garden nightlife. Enjoy!

> #### Sky Garden Rooftop BBQ
>
> **Address**:  Jalan Legian No.61, Kuta, Bali, Indonesia
>
> **Price**: From 99.000 IDR (7.45 USD)
>
> **Opening Hours**:  5pm - 9pm.
>
> **Duration**:  4 hours
>
> **Access**: Located on Jalan Legian, the main road in Kuta.
>
> **Contact**: +62 361 755423
>
> **Website**: [Sky Garden Rooftop BBQ](http://skygardenbali.com/promo/bbq/)

snippets.title: 4. Visit the Dream Museum Zone
snippets.description:
An evening of fun is easy at the Dream Museum Zone. This 3D trick art museum, located in Legian, features 120 life-sized murals, hand-painted by extraordinary, world famous illusion artists from Korea. The wall paintings create the perfect settings to take amazing photos. Kids will love it too!

> #### Dream Museum Zone
>
> **Address**:  Jalan Nakula 33X, Legian, Kuta, Bali, Indonesia
>
> **Price**: 110.000 IDR (8.25 USD)
>
> **Opening Hours**:  9am - 10pm. Closed on public holidays.
>
> **Duration**:  Around 1.5 hours required.
>
> **Access**: 2.8 kilometers /1.7 miles from Sky Garden, in the heart of Kuta
>
> **Contact**:  +62 361 8496220
>
> **Website**: [DMZ Bali](http://dmzbali.com/eng/)

snippets.title: 5.Take a trip to the cinema
snippets.description:
Enjoy an evening of family fun with a trip to the cinema. Choose between two or three of the latest blockbuster movies, get your popcorn and Coke, and get ready for two hours of full-blown entertainment at these state-of-the-art cinemas in Kuta, Bali.

> #### XXI Cinema 21 at the Beachwalk Shopping Center
>
> **Address**:  Beachwalk, secondfloor, Jalan Pantai Kuta, Kuta, Bali, Indonesia
>
> **Price**: 50.000 IDR on weekdays (3.75 USD), 60.000 IDR on Fridays (4.50 USD) and 75.000 (5.60 USD) on Saturdays, Sundays and public holidays. 
>
> **Opening Hours**:  12pm - 9.40pm.
>
> **Duration**:  Around 2 hours required.
>
> **Access**: 1 minute from Kuta Beach
>
> **Contact**:  +62 361 8464888
>
> **Website**: [Cinema XXI Beachwalk](http://www.beachwalkbali.com/cinema.geml)

snippets.title: 6. Rejuvenate with an evening spa treatment
snippets.title_with_numbering: 6. Rejuvenate with an evening spa treatment
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BLlKbRHjvlB/?taken-by=carla_spa_bali

The most relaxing option for an evening in Kuta is to get a full-blown spa package. Start with a relaxing foot massage, followed by a full body massage and a scrub, continue with a hot flower bath and finish it off with a cream bath for your hair with a manicure and pedicure. It sure is wonderful, and it's very affordable!

> #### Carla Spa
>
> **Address**:   Jalan Popies II, Kuta, Bali, Indonesia
>
> **Price**: from 90.000 IDR for a one-hour full body massage (6.75 USD)
>
> **Opening Hours**:  9am - 10pm.
>
> **Duration**:  1 hour required for a full body massage.
>
> **Access**: Located behind Beachwalk Shopping Mall / In front of Warung Nusantara
>
> **Contact**:  +62 851 728383
>
> **Website**: [Carla Spa](http://carlaspabali.com/index.php)

snippets.title: 7. Get some of that delicious Indonesian street food
snippets.title_with_numbering: 7. Get some of that delicious Indonesian street food
snippets.description:
After hours of relaxation, your belly might start to rumble again, craving some food. Well, good news! The Indonesian street food stalls open up in the evening, so there is always something good to be found. And after all, you can't visit Bali without trying the authentic local food, which is mostly found at local food stalls and evening markets. Choose between Soto Ayam (chicken soup), Bai Guling (suckling pig), Sate Ayam (chicken saté) or a good old Nasi Goreng (fried rice). It is freshly made and delicious! 

> #### Pasar Senggol Kuta
>
> **Address**: Jl. Blambangan, Kuta, Bali, Indonesia
>
> **Price**: from 15.000 IDR (1.15 USD)
>
> **Opening Hours**:  6pm - 11pm.
>
> **Duration**:  Around 1 hour required.
>
> **Access**: 1.1 kilometers / 1.3 miles from the Hard Rock Cafe Bali

snippets.title: 8. Take a beach walk beneath the stars
snippets.title_with_numbering: 8. Take a beach walk beneath the stars
snippets.description: Nothing is more romantic than strolling along the coastline in the evening when the beach is almost empty and the stars are shining brightly in the night sky. You can sit in the sand, listen to the waves and gaze at the stars above. Maybe you'll even get to see a shooting star, or is it a plane landing on the Island of the Gods? Either way, it is wonderfully romantic! Bring some drinks for the absolute perfect setting.

snippets.title: 9. Magic at the Kuta Theatre
snippets.description:
The cultural show at Kuta Theatre makes a great, fun night out for the whole family. You will get to see beautiful Balinese costumes and dances as well as modern magical tricks and illusions. It is scary, funny, intriguing and enchanting at the same time.
 
> #### Kuta Theatre
>
> **Address**: DEE JAY CLUB, Jl. Kartika Plaza 8X (Kuta centre)
>
> **Price**: 11 USD 
>
> **Show Times**: Tuesday, Thursday, Saturday, Sunday (8pm) 
>
> **Duration**:  Around 3 hours required.
>
> **Access**: Next to Waterbom Bali
>
> **Contact**:  +62 361 762750
>
> **Website**: [Kuta Theatre](http://kutatheatre.com/)

snippets.title: 10. Explore the nightlife of Kuta
snippets.description: Up for a night of dancing and fun with good friends? Kuta’s nightlife is never boring! In the lanes of Poppies I and Poppies II, there are lots of bars where you can listen to live music, enjoy drinks and play pool. Out on Jalan Legian, the main party street, you can go clubbing all night long. Think neon lights, loud music, crazy people, night clubs, rock music cafés and reggae bars. There is something for everyone!
